How does Fiori App achieve the role-based design principle
Sheet1.Option 1: Simple complex transactions are decomposed into several discrete apps suited to the user roles
Sheet1.Option 2: Navigation, personalisation, and application configuration are limited to ensure consistency across user roles
Sheet1.Option 3: The application interface adapts to the size and device used by the user.
Sheet1.Option 4: End user gets all the information and functions they need for their daily work, but nothing more.
